Package com.google.code.sagetvaddons.sagealert.shared

Interface Summary
ClientService RPC interface for saving/loading Client instances from the server
ClientServiceAsync The async version of the ClientService interface
HandlerService Interface for RPC handler operations
HandlerServiceAsync The async version of the HandlerService interface
IsDataStoreSerializable Denotes that an object can be serialized for storage in the data store.
NotificationServerSettings All notification systems are initiated by an object that implements this interface.
ReporterService Interface for RPC reporter operations.
ReporterServiceAsync The async version of the ReportService interface
SageAlertCustomEvent Plugin developers who wish to provide custom events for SageAlert must implement this interface when writing new event classes
SageAlertEvent All events being handled must be converted/packaged into a SageAlertEvent, which is what handlers use to send their notifications.
SettingsService The RPC interface for the settings server; allows getting/setting generic app data (settings); provides persistent data/state storage
SettingsServiceAsync The async version of the SettingsService interface
TwitterService  
TwitterServiceAsync  
UserSettings List of user configurable settings and their default values
 

Class Summary
Client A simple representation of a SageTV client; a client, in this context, refers to a client PC, extender, or a placeshifter.
CsvLogFileSettings  
EmailSettings  
ExeServerSettings  
GrowlServerSettings Stores all data/settings required to connect to a Growl server instance
SageAlertEventMetadata  
SmtpSettings Encapsulates all the settings required to connect to an SMTP server and send alerts via email
TwitterSettings Store the data required to connect to Twitter
 

Enum Summary
Client.EventType
